website_summaries.verdict: Another fantastic drone model to learn how to pilot a drone at your own pace, and it’s exciting to graduate from mastering the waters to owning the air.
pros: Flies as a quadcopter or sails as a hydrofoil for 2 drones in one
Detachable quadcopter for free flight at 11.18mph
cons: As incredible as having a dual flying and sailing drone is, enjoy it while you can
you’ll only get 9 minutes of playtime per charge

customer_reviews.title: It is the real deal, very cheap.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, i thought it would be a used hydrofoil, but its not. It is working just fine and i really enjoy playing with this thing, it came with everything needed, nothing missing and the quality is good. I recommend this seller, as it is very cheap and is the same Hydrofoil you see listed for twice the price...
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Fun and stable little drone
customer_reviews.text: this drone is very stable for such a small size battery life is a little shorter than I would like but plenty of time to have some fun . goo for a beginner app is easy to install and use very durable .
customer_reviews.author: lawrence clare

customer_reviews.title: Not good!
customer_reviews.text: Trashed after three flights. Could not control and could not recharge Don’t buy this one
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: It went up and never saw it again!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with it. Me and my children were playing for the second day flying the drone but suddenly it start going up and up... It didn't respond to my command for landing until it lost connection with the phone and I never saw it again. It went up until I lost sight of it. I would like to know if there is a kind of warranty for this! Or if someone can tell me how to replace the drone for another one so I can use it with the hydrofoil body...
customer_reviews.author: galit

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF JUNK! The cut off mode that you can't turn off makes it impossible to fly, you take off and then try to go forward it freaks out and shuts off and falls to the ground. I had it up 30 feet and then it cut off and fell to the ground propellors first, I got to hand it to it that it's very durable but it's still unflyable and impossible to use.
customer_reviews.author: Adham

customer_reviews.title: Ok for flying, pictures not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Got the drone for Christmas, it flies well, but connecting to my phone via bluetooth sometimes does not work and usually takes multiple tries. Taking pictures is easy, but getting them to transfer is the hard part. They usually will not transfer to the phone. If you want a drone just to fly around, this is ok for that. Forget about taking pictures. And good luck finding good enough instructions for troubleshooting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the drone at local Australian store and took ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the drone at local Australian store and took it out for a spin with two of my kids. After less than a minute the drone stopped responding to down and land commands though I could still move it around a bit. Unfortunately it continued going higher and higher even after the connection was lost. After a minute or two we lost the sight of it and never saw it again. I'd have thought the drone would attempt landing once connection was lost but sadly that was not the case. So similar story to galit. Really not worth it. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Dariusz Rak

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone at best buy and I am ver pleased. However I do not like how the propellers are flimsy and bend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hauserman

customer_reviews.title: Spent a good chunk of a day trying to complete the process ...
customer_reviews.text: The first reviewer at least had the excitement of watching the drone fly. We were unable to install the software update necessary to get the drone off the ground. Spent a good chunk of a day trying to complete the process -- to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Dadd

customer_reviews.title: This is a total waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this and who ever is selling this needs to stop!! This should be illegal. It won't download the update needed even though it it is new. Called company, requested call back and nothing. This is a total waste of money and time. I wish I could give it negative stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: THIS DRONE IS NOT WORTH IT!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son was flying this drone at about 5 feet from the ground and about 3 feet away. All of a sudden the drone flew up by itself and lost all connection. He tried to run after it but it kept getting higher and farther away

product_meta.title: Parrot Hydrofoil MiniDrone - Orak (Black)
product_meta.description:
Meet the new Hydrofoil MiniDrone! This hybrid MiniDrone uses propellers to cruise across fresh water at speeds of up to 6.2 mph. Built with streamlined foils and a hydrodynamic hull, Hydrofoil moves with amazing dexterity and agility, balancing 5-6cm above the water. When this MiniDrone takes flight, it can hit speeds of 11 mph.



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 


Be the captain and the pilot Go on air and sea adventures with your second-generation Parrot Hydrofoil MiniDrone. Experience two MiniDrones in one. Use the hydrofoil to glide through the water at speeds of up to 6.2 mph. When you’re ready to take flight, simply remove the hydrofoil and you’re good to go.

Speed along the water Built with streamlined foils and a hydrodynamic hull, your MiniDrone is ultra-stable as it moves with amazing dexterity and speed across the water. Easily control your flight using the FreeFlight 3 app, which allows you to perform rapid moves and turns on the go.


Twist and turn in flight Amplify your acrobatics with 360° forward and backward flips. Tilt from 90° to 180° with a single tap.


Stay balanced as you go Steering in Aquatic mode is as simple as attaching the removable nautical structure. An integrated antenna also increases your range of movement as you cruise along. In Flight mode, the 3-axis gyroscope and accelerometer work together to ensure ultimate stability. 


Take control of your flight Piloting your MiniDrone is simple with FreeFlight 3. Download the free app to your smartphone or tablet and get instant access to in-flight tricks and maneuvers. Take aerial photos during your flight and view them later with friends and family. *FreeFlight 3 is available in the App Store or in the Google Play Store.



Tips for getting started Before takeoff, be sure to update your Hydrofoil's software and fully charge its battery. For double the flight and glide time and twice the fun, pick up an extra battery with your purchase. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact our support team at 877-9Parrot (877-972-7768) or at www.parrot.com/support
feature_bullets: Water and air-ready Hydrofoil MiniDrone with embedded VGA mini camera (480X640)
Built with streamlined foils and hydrodynamic hull to move quickly through the water
Shock resistant and durable design makes it safe to do acrobatic flips and stunts
Free Flight Mini app gives you ultimate control from your smartphone or tablet
Removable, Lithium-Polymer 550mAh battery lasts up to 9 minutes and recharges in 25 minutes (with 2.6A charger, not included)
